name: speedof.modern - Flat and Modern speedof.me Style
description:
A flat, clean and modern theme for speedof.me. The original CSS has some horrific gradients and unecessary headers, footers and banner ads.

The start button might need a bit more work.

Before and after comparison: http://imgur.com/a/Chc7L
additional_info:
Changelog:

v0.1:
- Made the msgContainer elements visible again - they're actually useful
- Made the share button visible again - might also be useful
- Fixed unnecessary scrollbar from being visible
